verbs.description: [ARG0: philadelphia] [V: seeks] [ARG1: first win at yankee stadium in playoff encounter with nycfc per yankee stadium mandates] the philadelphia union will not be able to wear halloween masks as they enter the ball yard in the bronx ahead of their mls playoff match against new york city fc on wednesday night 7 08pm est kickoff pro soccer usa david villa yankee stadium mark mckenzie usa the bronx philadelphia ny philadelphia union new york city bronx soccer per yankee stadium nycfc
